alert.note: Alert for Halifax (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 8:07AM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Virginia... Roanoke (Staunton) River at Randolph affecting Charlotte and Halifax Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Virginia... Dan River at Dan River at Paces affecting Halifax County. Dan River at South Boston affecting Halifax County. For the Dan River...including Wentworth, STP near Danville, Dan River at Paces, South Boston...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Dan River at Dan River at Paces. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 24.0 feet, Low spots along Routes 658 and 671 begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 AM EST Friday the stage was 23.2 feet. - Bankfull stage is 18.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:45 AM EST Friday was 24.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage this afternoon and continue falling to 8.3 feet Tuesday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.4 feet on 02/17/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 815 PM EST.
